snippet: Tangerine Dream, a German electronic group led by Edgar Froese and known for its many movie soundtracks, performed Saturday night at the Best Buy Theater.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by German electronic group Tangerine Dream at the Best Buy Theater.
lead_paragraph: Tangerine Dream, a German electronic group led by Edgar Froese and known for its many movie soundtracks, performed Saturday night at the Best Buy Theater.

headline.seo: Tangerine Dream at Best Buy Theater
headline.main: Synthesizers and Drum Machines, Sure, but With a Touch of the Human
headline.print_headline: Synthesizers and Drum Machines, Sure, but With a Touch of the Human
